input_text:
Job Title: Travel RRT - $1,853 per week in Duncan, OK

Location: Duncan, OK

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Premier is searching for a Healthcare Ambassador like you!

At Premier Medical Staffing Services, we are guided by our core values: Personal Attention, Relationships, Empathy, Giving More, Integrity, Excellence and Respect. We are seeking clinicians that are compassionate, resilient, and strive to deliver the highest level of care to patients. If you possess these characteristics and will champion our core values, we would love to have you on our team. Premier is dedicated to matching you with a placement that is right for you.

Military Veterans, National Guard and Reserve members, and Military Spouses are encouraged to apply.

Essentials For Employment

Unrestricted State License or CertificationMinimum 1 year of experienceUnrestricted physical for lifting, pushing, pullingCompliance with any other licensing or credentialing requirementsBLS Certification with the American Heart AssociationACLS required with the American Heart Association for high acuity specialties

Fast Track to Your Next Adventure!

Provide 2 responsive supervisor/manager references worked within previous 12 monthsResume detailing all work historyPhysical completed within last 12 monthsUpdated immunization records

Employee Benefits

Weekly Pay and Direct Deposit with online access to all paystubs and W2sReferral ProgramCEU Program after 1040 hours worked24-Hour On-Call SupportDay 1 Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance – Ask Recruiter about EligibilityJoint Commission Certified

About Premier Medical Staffing Services

Premier Medical Staffing Services, LLC ("Premier") is one of the fastest growing healthcare staffing firms in the country. We offer medical jobs nationwide for nursing and allied professionals with a full range of travel and local contract assignments. Located in Milwaukee, WI, we are owned and operated by medical professionals, allowing us to meet and exceed the expectations of healthcare providers across the US. When working with clinicians, Premier recruiters are responsive to the needs of the individual and are dedicated to their satisfaction. While working with Premier, you can expect to take the next step in your career on your own terms: from assignment location to shift hours to housing. We are proud to offer competitive benefits to our employees, and we are dedicated to finding what`s right for each clinician we work with.

Premier is an award-winning medical employment agency with accolades ranging from Milwaukee Business Journal’s Best Places to Work to Staffing Industry Analysts’ Best Staffing Firms. Premier is certified as a Women Owned Business by the Women’s Business Enterprise National Council (WBENC), is Joint Commission Certified, and is a Military Spouse Employment Partner (MSEP).

Don’t miss your chance to be part of our five-star team!

Equal Employment Opportunity Employer

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
